channel.title: escience lazycache on CamHD Video Analysis
channel.description: Recent content in escience lazycache on CamHD Video Analysis

item.title: A Brief Tour of LazyCache Part I, the Software
item.description: With the time set aside for the eScience Incubator, I’ve reached a (very) minimal working example of the CamHD caching/server software which is fully deployable to a Google Compute Engine instance. It isn’t terribly stable or configurable, but I can make improve those slowly. It seems like a good time to step back, take stock and document. At this point I’m going to worry about how I’m doing it. What and why I’m doing it is a whole ‘nother story.
